## {{< iconify fa6-solid:book-atlas >}} &nbsp; Welcome to the internal Pôle Méca seminar series webapge!

This wiki serves as a central hub for all the Pôle Méca seminar series. This series consists of **weekly seminars** co-organised by all labs from the **Pôle Mécanique**. Anyone (PhD students, postdocs and permanent faculty memebers) are welcome to present their work!

Here, you will find:

* [**Schedule**](Schedule.qmd): The schedule of the internal seminar series.
* [**Past Seminars Archive**](PastSeminarsArchive.qmd): The list of past seminars with the associated decks of slides.
* [**Registration page**](Registration.qmd): A page to register as a speaker.
